title: Flipped Learning-Based Project Education for Cardiac Assessment Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing digital devices and online platforms, operating personalized feedback systems for individual learners

learning_goals: Over 90% of learners can systematically apply the 6-step cardiac assessment process.
In problem-based scenarios, learners predict potential cardiac issues with 85% accuracy through patient history analysis.
In PBL team projects, learners achieve 3.5 or higher on a 4-level evaluation scale for creating and presenting diagnosis reports based on real cases.
Using digital simulation tools, learners improve the accuracy of heart sound auscultation and venous pressure assessment by over 70%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
